title: Visiting Cemetery / Graveyard in Ramadan, Eid, Friday - Assim al hakeem
transcript: indonesia he says there's a practice in indonesia that they visit cemeteries in ramadan and likewise in arabia there is a practice that they visit cemeteries on the eat some of them on friday all of these are innovations connecting the visit to a particular time or a season makes it a read and this is not permissible yes it is recommended to go and visit whenever you have time but not to allocate a particular event or time to visit them thinking that they'll be happy etc you
